## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Data viz

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(polite)
library(rvest)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
ultimate_dataset <- read.csv("/Users/Vishnu/Downloads/ultimate_college_championship.csv")
```

```{r filter}
d1 <- ultimate_dataset[ultimate_dataset$level == "Division 3",]
```

```{r}
# Plot plus_minus variable against pts_per_game

plus_minus_factos <- d1 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = plus_minus, y = pts_per_game)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Plus minus",
       y = "Points per game",
       title = "Plus minus stat versus points per game")

plus_minus_factos
```
